name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian dish with tomato sauce and ground beef
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions
In a separate pan, brown the ground beef, onion, and garlic
Add the crushed tomatoes and spices to the beef mixture
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic American cookie with chocolate chips
instructions: Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
In a separate bowl, cream the butter and sugars together
Add the eggs and vanilla to the butter mixture and mix well
Add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture and mix well
Spoon the dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes
